title: Where do i report scammers
body: Hi, today I played an aram with a friend and after the game ended 2 of my teammates added me and sent obviously fake links about a riot free rp event. I took 2 screenshots but i dont know where i should report them. Thank you.

replies.body: Sorry that happened, though I'm glad you were able to catch that and not fall for the phishing.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll lock those accounts and help get it back to their rightful owner.  Thanks for the assist!
